title: Chapter 743 - Like An Immortal Of The Sword, Forceful And Unrivaled
body:
Chapter 743 - Like An Immortal Of The Sword, Forceful And Unrivaled

Throughout history, undergoing tribulation had always been perilous, with only a small chance of success. Cultivators underwent multiple layers of tribulation, overcoming life and death trials before seizing a thread of life force, proving their Dao, and breaking through.

The Spirit Dao cultivators’ memories of the obstacles and perils they’d faced during their own tribulations were carved deep within their hearts.

Nonetheless, as they witnessed Su Yi undergo tribulation, they were struck dumb.

One slash, that’s all, yet he’d cleaved through one hundred thousand feet of tribulation cloud and reduced an unprecedentedly grand tribulation to powder!

This was unquestionably far too unbelievable.

Many of the onlookers felt as if they were dreaming; it didn’t feel quite real.

After all, earlier, all of them had sensed that Su Yi’s Tribulation of Spiritual Incarnation was extremely terrifying and unusual, and that it was full of a strange, taboo aura.

That forceful divine might filled even the Spiritual Revolution Realm cultivators’ hearts with terror and despair!

That was why all of Su Yi’s would-be enemies—Huan Shanglin, Xie Zhibei, Wang Zhongyang, and their allies—were perfectly certain that if they interfered, Su Yi would be doomed. His tribulation would...
original_title: Chapter 743 - Like an Immortal of the Sword, Forceful and Unrivaled
